featureList: Capture Proof of Delivery or Service
Optimize Across Drivers, Vehicles and Depots
Strategic Route Simulation: Run "what-if" scenarios to compare costs and efficiency before committing resources
Historical Pattern Analysis: Leverage historical service data to automatically predict optimal visit frequencies and duration
Planned vs. Actual Variance Reporting: detailed auditing of route execution against original plans to identify efficiency gaps
Multi-Facility & Regional Hierarchy: Segment operations, users, and data visibility by specific depots, warehouses, or business units
Asset & Equipment Tracking: Track physical assets (containers, generators) alongside vehicles for complete field visibility
Customizable Business Terminology: Rename system entities (e.g., "Visits" instead of "Stops") to match specific industry language
Dynamic Service Time Calculation: Automatically calculate stop duration based on specific service types and quantities (e.g., installation vs. inspection)
Man-Hours & Labor Tracking: Track labor costs and hours separately from vehicle time for accurate service profitability analysis
Time Window Compliance: Automated detection and visualization of early/late arrivals against promised customer windows
ERP Data Synchronization: Sync Orders, Invoices, and Item Masters (Products) for authoritative financial alignment
